ygData.subject: RE: JBoots, Rubi & Beyond
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh...sense magic is a awesome spell. Easiest way for a shaman to raise his Divination skill. Target yerself, pick something up, and cast away while waiting
ygData.messageBody:
Heh...sense magic is a awesome spell. Easiest way for a shaman to raise his
Divination skill. Target yerself, pick something up, and cast away while
waiting for spawn, the boat, whatever. I used to have trouble castnig some
shields....fizzling 20 tmies in a row for a shield sucked.... I got about 80
points of Divin out of sense magic... (as a shaman).

-----Original Message-----
From: Steven Cobb [mailto:cobb@...]
Sent: October 11, 1999 2:17 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] JBoots, Rubi & Beyond


From: Steven Cobb <cobb@...>

I think several classes have it. It's not all that great. All I have
ever gotten from it was an "In-game name" for items. Like the
Blackened Wand or whatever. If you cast Ident on it, you get a name of
"Wand of So-and-So" I think it's mostly as hints to quest items. You
wouldn't know that the blackened wand was related to a quest if the
NPCs are all talking about some guy's wand, but the blackened was the
actuall quest item. (Unless, the info was posted somewhere.) :)

The info I have recieved from identify has hardly been the trouble to
mem and cast the spell. (IMO at least) The only thing more useless
than Ident is Sense magic. Every stupid thing that I would sense magic
on already had (MAGIC ITEM) in the description.

"Whitcraft,David" wrote:
>
> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>

> love to get happy about them fixing and finishing stuff....just hasn't
been
> a good track record for shaman promises though...
>

good
> one ;-)
